text:
Whenever the Board of Appeals shall issue a decision granting or modifying a variance on appeal from the Zoning Administrator, pursuant to Charter Sections 
4.105 and 
4.106 and the Planning Code, the Executive Secretary of the Board of Appeals shall immediately transmit a copy of such decision to the Assessor. 
(Added by Ord. 113-75, App. 4/4/75; amended by Ord. 126-97, App. 4/9/97; Ord. 254-00, File No. 001548, App. 10/27/2000)
ARTICLE II:
[RESERVED]
Sec. 34.6.
(Added by Ord. 113-75, App. 4/4/75; repealed by Ord. 254-00, File No. 001548, App. 10/27/2000)
